text: Uncle Vanya () is a 1970 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrey Konchalovskiy.Резко сдавший Александр Домогаров: «Меня из театра вынесут только вперед ногами»ДЯДЯ ВАНЯ (1970) It stars Innokenti Smoktunovsky, Sergei Bondarchuk, and Irina Kupchenko. == Actors == *Innokenti Smoktunovsky as Ivan "Uncle Vanya" Voinitsky *Sergei Bondarchuk as Dr. Mikhail Lvovich Astrov *Irina Kupchenko as Sofia "Sonya" Aleksandrovna Serebryakova *Irina Miroshnichenko as Helena (Yelena) Andreevna Serebryakova *Irina Anisimova-Wulf as Mariya Vasilievna Voinitskaya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Uncle Vanya (1970 movie)
